summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2010 FORD ESCAPE. WHILE DRIVING 20 MPH, THE POWER STEERING INTERMITTENTLY OPERATED WITHOUT WARNING. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO ADVANTAGE FORD OF STUART (LOCATED AT 4000 SE FEDERAL HWY, STUART, FL 34997, (772) 287-0955) WHERE IT WAS DIAGNOSED THAT THE TORQUE SENSOR OR STEERING COLUMN MAY NEED TO BE REPAIRED. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT REPAIRED. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE VEHICLE WAS PREVIOUSLY REPAIRED PER NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 14V284000 (STEERING). THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOTIFIED OF THE FAILURE. THE APPROXIMATE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 115,000. *BF  VEHICLE WAS REPAIRED ON DEC. 17,2018.*JB
